p: Heilongjiang and Henan, as well as Anhui and Chongqing, showed a pattern compatible with assortativity, i.e., nodes of similar rank were associated with a similar level of mortality ( Figure 1C). While it is suspected that assortativity also occurred in Hubei (press reports suggest at least two epidemic nodes developed in their hospitals and in one prison) ( China Prison, 2020), the lack of point-based data prevented its identification.
